org.pool4j
Class ScalingResourcePool<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.pool4j.ScalingResourcePool<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of resource this pool will manage
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourcePool<T>
public final class ScalingResourcePool<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ResourcePool<T>

A resource pool implementation which scales the number of resources based on pool usage. As resource demand increases, the pool will create new resources as needed. As demand decreases, the pool will free resources and scale itself down. This resource pool is ideal for managing resources that are cheap to create, but have a large memory footprint. This implementation is thread-safe.

Author:
Evan Worley
